original: 吳郡富春人，東吳宗室。魏滅蜀之戰，吳帝孫休遣丁奉率軍救援，丁奉和孫異率軍溯漢水而上，但未及交鋒，蜀漢便已降魏。之後記載不明。
text: People from Fuchun in Wu Jun, Dongwu clan. In the battle between Wei and Shu, Emperor Wu, Sun Xiu sent Ding Feng to lead his army to rescue, and Ding Feng and Sun Yi led his army to the Han River, but before the battle, the Shu Han had fallen to Wei. The record is unknown afterwards.
